sn56.38:1.1: “Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, candimasuriya loke nuppajjanti, neva tava mahato alokassa patubhavo hoti mahato obhasassa.
sn56.38:1.3: Neva tava rattindiva pannayanti, na masaddhamasa pannayanti, na utusamvacchara pannayanti.
sn56.38:2.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, candimasuriya loke uppajjanti, atha mahato alokassa patubhavo hoti mahato obhasassa.
sn56.38:2.2: Neva andhakaratamam tada hoti na andhakaratimisa.
sn56.38:2.3: Atha rattindiva pannayanti, masaddhamasa pannayanti, utusamvacchara pannayanti.
sn56.38:2.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yavakivanca tathagato loke nuppajjati araham sammasambuddho, neva tava mahato alokassa patubhavo hoti mahato obhasassa.
sn56.38:2.6: Neva tava catunnam ariyasaccanam acikkhana hoti desana pannapana patthapana vivarana vibhajana uttanikammam.
sn56.38:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho, atha mahato alokassa patubhavo hoti mahato obhasassa.
sn56.38:3.2: Neva andhatamam tada hoti na andhakaratimisa.
sn56.38:3.3: Atha kho catunnam ariyasaccanam acikkhana hoti desana pannapana patthapana vivarana vibhajana uttanikammam.
sn56.38:4.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
